name: Dating and Dungeons
description:
Dating and Dungeons is a DnD-themed dating sim set in Minnaar City. Figure out what this new city is like after fleeing from your old one (in a less than happy way.)

Figure out what makes the men of Minnaar tick, and find out which ones may turn against you. 

This is currently a demo! There are currently four datables introduced with more to come! So come on by and stay for the ride in Dating and Dungeons!

Made in part for the SuNoFes 2022 Game Jam!

Main Credits:

WRITING AND CODING: Isawter

CHARACTER DESIGN: Isawter, Purely Anonymous, Kess

MENU ART: Purely Anonymous, Isawter

BACKGROUND ART: Isawter

SPRITE ART: Purely Anonymous, Isawter, and Braxton Thompson

Please view the Readme for full credits! Thank you all for your support!
